original: Saved Instead of Favorite Horse
translation: 把挑选战马的钱省下来

original: You go out into the herd to choose a strong and powerful warhorse. You look around with expert eyes and eventually spot a steed that stands out from the rest. It is strong and has a powerful bearing.\n\nAs you mount your new steed, you feel certain that you have made the right choice. All that remains now is to give it a suitable name - what shall it be?
translation: 你去马群里挑选一匹强壮有力的战马。你左顾右盼最终找到一匹鹤立鸡群的坐骑。它十分强壮，体态威猛。\n\n当你骑上你的新坐骑的时候，你确信你做了一个正确的选择。现在只剩下取一个合适的名字——叫什么好呢？

original: Dragon.
Sky.
Arrow.
Lightning.
Your ward, [ward_cant_ride.GetFirstName], is almost eight years old now and still cannot ride a horse properly. It is truly a disgrace.
translation: 你的受监护人，[ward_cant_ride.GetFirstName]，已经快八岁了，还不知道怎么驾驭一匹马。真是丢人现眼。

original: This will not do! I shall teach [ward_cant_ride.GetHerHim] personally.
translation: 这可不行！我会亲自教育[ward_cant_ride.GetHerHim]。

original: What a useless child. Let [ward_cant_ride.GetHerHim] flounder.
translation: 真是个没用的孩子。让[ward_cant_ride.GetHerHim]折腾去吧。

original: The River Crossing

Traveling from one of your camps to the next, you come upon a river. Rains have made it swell and the rapids are strong and violent. The way around is too long, however, so you must cross. You watch with concern as the party gingerly begins to descend into the churning waters. [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName], your [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetHusbandWife], crosses riding your favorite horse.\n\nYou are watching from the bank as it suddenly happens... [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName] loses control in the strong rapids and falls off the horse as it loses its footing, and both of them are grabbed by the strong current. You realize that you only have a moment to react before they are swept away, you cannot save them both...
translation: 在你从一个营寨行进到下一个营寨的时候，你遇到了一条河。大雨使得河水上涨，湍急难行。绕过此河的道路又太遥远，所以你必须通过。你紧张的看着众人小心翼翼的跨入河水中。[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName]，你的[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetHusbandWife]骑着你最爱的马渡河。\n\n你在河岸上观望着他们，突然……[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName]在湍急的河水中失去了控制，随着战马的失去平衡也摔了下来，一起被河水带走。你意识到在他们被卷走之前，你只有机会做出一个决定，你没法同时拯救两条生命……

original: I must save [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName]!
I must save Dragon!
I must save Sky!
I must save Arrow!
I must save Lightning!

You managed to pull [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName] out of the river. You lost your favorite horse, but your [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetHusbandWife] is safe. [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetSheHeCap] is terrified but overjoyed at the narrow escape and your brave rescue.
translation: 你把[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName]从河水中拖了出来。你失去了你最心爱的马，但是你的[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetHusbandWife]安全了。[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetSheHeCap]被吓到，不过对侥幸存活和你的英勇拯救感到喜悦。

original: I am glad [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetSheHe]'s safe.
Alas, I lost Dragon...
Alas, I lost Sky...
Alas, I lost Arrow...
Alas, I lost Lightning...

You managed to pull [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName] out of the river. Once safe, [spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetSheHe] stands up, dripping wet and shivering, and curses you: 'You imbecile! I would have been fine! How could you let that fine horse drown?'
translation: 你成功将[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetFirstName]从河水中拖出来。一安全获救，[spouse_danger_nomad_river_crossing.GetSheHe]就站在那里全身湿透并且浑身发抖的咒骂你：「你这个蠢货！我才不会有事！你怎么能让那么一匹好马淹死？」

original: I, too, now question my decision.
translation: 我，现在也，后悔我的决定。

original: One of your loyal retinue warriors has approached you with a petition for aid. He says his family lost several of their mares to illness and now they are struggling to feed their children.
translation: 你手下的一个近卫军战士请求你能帮助他。他说他家里的母马有不少染病而亡，导致他们现在都快喂不饱孩子了。

original: You shall have six mares from my personal herd.
translation: 你可以从我的私人马群里带走六匹母马。

original: Unfortunate, but I cannot help you.
translation: 真是不幸，但是我不能帮助你。

original: Participated in Wargames
Hold Wargames
I can invite warriors of my realm to compete in games of martial skill - horsemanship, archery and swordsmanship. There will be gold as well as prestige in it for the winner.
translation: 我可以邀请我国内的勇士们来比赛他们的军事技能——马术，箭术，武艺和剑术。胜者将会获得黄金和威望。

original: Holding Wargames
This ruler is hosting a traditional competition in martial skills.
translation: 这个统治者正在举行一场传统武艺比赛。

original: Held Wargames
This character has recently hosted a traditional competition in martial skills, thus honoring ancient values and martial traditions.
translation: 此人最近已经举办了一场传统武艺比赛，以此向古老价值和武艺传统致敬。

original: You have decided to organize a great competition in martial skills, inviting warriors from across the realm to display their prowess with horse, bow and sword.
translation: 你决定组织一场盛大的武艺大赛，邀请王国里的勇士们来展现他们在马术，弓箭和长剑上的造诣。

original: It will be a great contest.
translation: 这将是一场伟大的比赛。

original:
To my faithful warrior [Root.GetDynName],

I shall expect your presence at the upcoming wargames that will be held at [From.Capital.GetName]

[From.GetFullName]
translation:
致我忠实的勇士[Root.GetDynName]，

我期待你能在即将举办于[From.Capital.GetName]的武艺大赛上出现。

[From.GetFullName]

original: I will saddle my horse now!

Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Unfortunately I cannot attend the upcoming wargames.

[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

很不幸的是，我无法参加即将举办的武艺大赛。

[From.GetTitledName]

original: Warriors have come to your court from afar, gathering for the great wargames. The impatient stomping of horses accompanies the excited cries from the spectators. As the participants salute you, you give the signal for the contest to begin.
translation: 勇士们从四面八方来到你的宫廷，参加这伟大的武艺大赛。马驹们迫不及待的跺脚声交杂着观众们的呐喊。随着所有参赛者向你致敬后，你发出了开始的信号。

original: The best warrior shall win!

You have arrived at the court of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] for the wargames. The impatient stomping of horses accompanies the excited cries from the spectators. As you salute [From.GetTitledFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] gives the signal for the contest to begin.
translation: 你为了大赛来到了[From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]的宫廷。马驹们迫不及待的跺脚声交杂着观众们的呐喊。在你向[From.GetTitledFirstName]敬礼后，[From.GetSheHe]发出了比赛开始的信号。

original: I shall give it my best!
Your skill with horse, bow and sword unmatched on this day, you have won the games! [From.GetTitledFirstName] presents you with your well-earned prize.
translation: 你在马术，弓箭和剑术上世间无人能敌，你赢得了大赛！[From.GetTitledFirstName]把你应得的奖品颁发给了你。

original: I knew I would win!
[From.GetFullName] has won the wargames, [From.GetHerHis] martial skills unmatched.
A worthy winner.
Controls or Besieges §Y$PROVINCE$§!
Suzerain
Fort Construction Lost
The Fort under construction by §Y$BUILDER$§! in the hostile county of §Y$PROV$§! has been abandoned.
translation: §Y$BUILDER$§!在§Y$PROV$§!的敌军领土上正在建造的堡垒被放弃了。

original: Under Nomad Succession, the son or brother with the most Prestige normally inherits, but prestigious Clan leaders also stand a chance if their Population is bigger than the Khagan's. Wrong-culture characters are disqualified and adults have precedence over children. If the Khagan's primary heir is still a child, the Khaganate is lost to one of the Clan chiefs. Clan chiefs with more Prestige than the heir get Claims on the Khaganate.
translation: 在游牧继承法中，通常拥有最多威望的儿子或者兄弟继承，不过声威卓著的部族领袖人口比可汗还多，那他们也有机会继承汗位。错误文化的角色无权继承，成年人比小孩有优先权。如果可汗的第一继承人还是个孩子，那么可汗国将会被其中一个部族领袖继承。部族领袖如果比可汗继承人有更多的威望将会获得可汗国的宣称。

original: §YNumber of Clans§!
Desired Counties per Clan
Max Number of Clans
Current Clans
Current Population Breakdown

This is the nomadic population of your realm. Each month, it will increase or decrease towards your §YMaximum Population§!, which is determined by the number of empty holdings in the counties you personally hold. The current §YPopulation§! is used to calculate your §YMaximum Manpower§!, and is also along with §YUnused Manpower§! used to calculate your monthly §YNomadic Tax§!.
translation: 这是你领地里的游牧人口。每个月它都会趋向于你的§Y最大人口§!而发生变化，而你的§Y最大人口§!则取决于你的直辖省份内的空地产数目。当前§Y人口§!用来计算你的§Y最大人力§!，还与§Y未用人力§!一同用于计算你每月的§Y游牧税§!。

original: Potential Population Growth: §Y$AMOUNT$§!
Monthly Population Growth Percentage: §Y$AMOUNT$%§!
Potential Manpower Growth: §Y$AMOUNT$§!
Monthly Manpower Growth Percentage: §Y$AMOUNT$%§!
You cannot attack your vassals with this Casus belli
translation: 你不能用这个宣战理由攻击你的封臣

original: Click the button to create a new unit. You can reorganize the selected unit and the newly created unit by dragging subunits from one unit to another.
translation: 点击按钮建立一支新的部队单位。从一个单位拖动次级单位到另一个单位，你便可重新组织选中的单位和新创立的单位。

original: To the right you can see a tab named Fleet Levies. Click on it and you will see buttons for raising fleets instead of army levies. Raise the fleet of your vassal the Earl of Fife and move them to Gowrie as well.
translation: 在右侧你可以看到征召舰队的标签。点击之你将看到调集征召兵的按钮变成了召集舰队。召集你封臣法伊夫伯爵的舰队并将它们移动到高里。

original: Technology can spread
Technology can NOT spread
No other Silk Road Province within a distance of §Y100§! contains a §YSilk Road Trade Post§!, §YSilk Road Market§! or §YMajor Silk Road City§!.
translation: 在 §Y100§! 距离范围没有其他丝绸之路省份建有§Y丝路贸易站§!，§Y丝路集市§!或§Y丝路主城§!。

original: No other Silk Road Province within a distance of §Y200§! contains a §YSilk Road Market§! or §YMajor Silk Road City§!.
translation: 在 §Y200§! 距离范围没有其他丝绸之路省份建有§Y丝路集市§!或§Y丝路主城§!。

original: No other Silk Road Province within a distance of §Y500§! contains a §YMajor Silk Road City§!.
translation: 在 §Y500§! 距离范围没有其他丝绸之路省份建有§Y丝路主城§!。

original: Monthly Population Growth
Monthly Population Decline
Maximum Population

Manpower is an important part of a nomadic realm, as it is used both to recruit hordes and to reinforce them. Each month, it will increase or decrease towards your §YMaximum Manpower§!, determined by the current §YPopulation§!. You cannot recruit hordes to go above this limit, and you should make sure you have enough §YUnused Manpower§! to reinforce your horde when needed. Your §YUnused Manpower§! is also part of the calculation of your monthly §YNomadic Tax§!, along with the §YPopulation§!. Additionally, your §YUnused Manpower§! will contribute to the strength of the §YGarrison§! in your capital.
translation: 人力是游牧国家的重要资源，它可以用来招募和补员游牧军队。每个月它都会趋向于你的§Y最大人力§!而发生变化，而你的§Y最大人力§!则取决于你的§Y人口§!。你不能超上限地招募游牧军队，而且你应该确保自己有足够的§Y未用人力§!以在必要时及时补充游牧军队。你的§Y未用人力§!还与§Y人口数量§!一同参与计算每月的§Y游牧税§!。此外，你的§Y未用人力§!还会增强首都的§Y守军§!。

original: §YPopulation and Manpower of Clan $CLAN$§!

If the Khagan holds too much land compared to the other Clans, it will affect their §YClan Sentiments§!, and there might even be risk of a §YMinor Clan Rising§! revolt, in which a minor clan rises and attempts to seize its rightful position among the major Clans...
translation: 如果可汗和其他部族比起来多出太多土地，将会影响他们的§Y部族观感§!，而且将会有引发§Y次级部族起事§!的风险，一个弱小的部族将会揭竿而起，试图从主流部族那里夺取他们的正当地位……

original: Retinues: §R-$VALUE$§!
Has not reached the Maximum Clan Size
translation: 还没有达到最大部族数量

original: Light Rider
Marauder
Skirmish Cavalry
Light Horse Archer
Light Vanguard
Heavy Vanguard
Horse Archer
Lancer
The religion of §Y$CHAR$§! allows female temple holders and female spiritual councilors
translation: §Y$CHAR$§!的宗教允许女性持有神殿和女性宗教内阁成员

original: Have lower Population and Manpower than
Have higher Population and Manpower than
Have lower Civilian Population Growth than
Have higher Civilian Population Growth than
Have lower Max Population and Manpower than
Have higher Max Population and Manpower than
$DIRECTION$ $VALUE$ Population.\n
Is county owner
Is NOT in own realm
Distance to §Y$PROV$§!: §Y$DIST$§!
Killed My Horse
I was just about to leave Lightning by the watering hole, when [From.GetFirstName]'s horse reached out and bit [Root.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我正要离开，将雷霆留在饮水处，[From.GetFirstName]的马就冲了过来咬了[Root.GetHerHim]！

original: I was just about to leave Arrow by the watering hole, when [From.GetFirstName]'s horse reached out and bit [Root.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我正要离开，将利箭留在饮水处，[From.GetFirstName]的马就冲了过来咬了[Root.GetHerHim]！

original: I was just about to leave Dragon by the watering hole, when [From.GetFirstName]'s horse reached out and bit [Root.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我正要离开，将巨龙留在饮水处，[From.GetFirstName]的马就冲了过来咬了[Root.GetHerHim]！

original: I was just about to leave Sky by the watering hole, when [From.GetFirstName]'s horse reached out and bit [Root.GetHerHim]!
translation: 我正要离开，将苍穹留在饮水处，[From.GetFirstName]的马就冲了过来咬了[Root.GetHerHim]！

original: I'll have that beast killed!
There's a better watering spot over here...
translation: 那里有个更好的饮水地……

original: I haven't been feeling quite like myself during the last couple of weeks. It feels like there's a piece of myself missing now that my favorite horse is gone.
translation: 最近几个星期我都神魂不定。自从我那心爱的马走了之后，我就感觉我缺少了一部分。

original: I have to carry this burden alone.
translation: 现在我要独自背负重担。

original: I'm lucky to have a [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] to comfort me.
I'm lucky to have a friend to comfort me.
translation: 我很幸运，有一个朋友来安慰我。

original: A foreign painter arrived at your camp today. The painter has previously created beautiful portraits of many noble feudal families and now offers his services to you.
translation: 今天，一个外国的画师来到了你的营地。这个画师曾经为很多贵族家庭绘制过精美的肖像画，现在他将为你提供服务。

original: I want a portrait of myself.
I want a portrait of my beloved wife.
translation: 我想要一幅我深爱的妻子的画像。

original: I want a portrait of my beautiful concubine.
translation: 我想要一幅我美丽的侍妾的画像。

original: I want a portrait of my magnificent horse, Sky.
translation: 我想要一幅我雄壮的战马，苍穹的画像。

original: I want a portrait of my magnificent horse, Lightning.
translation: 我想要一幅我雄壮的战马，雷霆的画像。

original: I want a portrait of my magnificent horse, Arrow.
translation: 我想要一幅我雄壮的战马，利箭的画像。

original: I want a portrait of my magnificent horse, Dragon.
translation: 我想要一幅我雄壮的战马，巨龙的画像。

original: I can't afford this.

Lightning, your favorite warhorse, has now taken [Root.GetHerHis] last gallop across the steppe and begun the eternal sleep. It is time to take your farewell of an old friend that has served you well.
translation: 雷霆，你最喜欢的战马，在草原上完成了[Root.GetHerHis]最后一次飞奔，开始了永恒的安眠。你的老朋友忠心耿耿地侍奉你多年，现在是时候对它说再见了。

original: Sky, your favorite warhorse, has taken [Root.GetHerHis] last gallop across the steppe and begun the eternal sleep. It is time to take your farewell of an old friend that has served you well.
translation: 苍穹，你最喜欢的战马，在草原上完成了[Root.GetHerHis]最后一次飞奔，开始了永恒的安眠。你的老朋友忠心耿耿地侍奉你多年，现在是时候对它说再见了。

original: Dragon, your favorite warhorse, has taken [Root.GetHerHis] last gallop across the steppe and begun the eternal sleep. It is time to take your farewell of an old friend that has served you well.
translation: 巨龙，你最喜欢的战马，在草原上完成了[Root.GetHerHis]最后一次飞奔，开始了永恒的安眠。你的老朋友忠心耿耿地侍奉你多年，现在是时候对它说再见了。

original: Arrow, your favorite warhorse, has taken [Root.GetHerHis] last gallop across the steppe and begun the eternal sleep. It is time to take farewell to your steed that has served you well.
translation: 利箭，你最喜欢的战马，在草原上完成了[Root.GetHerHis]最后一次飞奔，开始了永恒的安眠。你的老朋友忠心耿耿地侍奉你多年，现在是时候对它说再见了。

original: Goodbye, old friend.
Abandon Trade Post
A Trade Post has been built by §Y$CHARACTER$§! in §Y$PROVINCE$§!.
Trade Route Trade Post Built
translation: 贸易路线上的贸易站建成

original: You can abandon your trade post in this county in favor of a better location.
translation: 你可以放弃这个省份的贸易站，以便换一个更好的地方。

original: All Trade Zones, separated by their owners. Provinces on the Silk Road are shown striped in yellow if active or red if blocked by siege or occupation.
translation: 所有贸易区，将会按照他们的拥有者分开标记。在丝绸之路上的省份如果一切正常将会被黄色条块覆盖，如果因为占领或者围攻被阻塞了，将会被红色条块覆盖。
